name: Quest Tycoon
description:
Play as an innkeeper desperately trying to keep his inn in operation by sending adventurers out on dangerous quests in hopes of them surviving and needing your inn to rest! The more quests completed by adventurers at your inn, the more adventurers will come to you for quests!, Be careful though, because if an adventurer completes your quest they expect a reward, and running an inn isn't cheap!

Inspired by December 2015 - #1GAM(One Game A Month Challenge) "Quest Giver" Topic.
